title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: Datetime values retrieved from the table are displayed in different formats when viewed in a dynamic text item compared to a data/text item.
EB: Datetime values retrieved from the table should consistently display in the same format, whether in a dynamic text item or a data/text item.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Retrieve datetime values from the table.
2. View the values in a dynamic text item.
3. View the values in a data/text item.
4. Observe the difference in formatting between the two.
